text:
In writing this book, I imagined that you were provided with a dataset and a desire to use
deep learning methods to address it. I designed the chapters to walk you through the process of
ﬁrst establishing a baseline of performance with naive and classical methods. I then provide
step-by-step tutorials to show exactly how to develop a suite of diﬀerent types of neural network
models for time series forecasting. After we cover these basics, I then hammer home how to use
